name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KeepChatGPT - Enable ChatGPT to chat smooth

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool enables ChatGPT to chat smoothly, never experiencing network errors again, and no need to refresh the webpage anymore.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FEATURE

- Resolved error: NetworkError when attempting to fetch resource.
- Resolved error: Something went wrong. If this issue persists please contact us through our help center at help.openai.com.
- Resolved error: Conversation not found
- Cancel audit: This content may violate our content policy. If you believe this to be in error, please submit your feedback â€” your input will aid our research in this area.
- Resolved frequent interruptions during communication
- Resolved frequent webpage refreshing
- Resolved the issue of accidentally copying user avatars
